posts.post_content:
Just back from SGC today, 6 different T3's, all graded SGC-10

The grading/slabbing fee is $50 each (+ roundtrip shipping) when submitting less then 10
The SGC slab is 10 1/2 x 7 1/2"

Priced to move at $139 dlvd via insured Priority mail in a box
2 or more at just $129 each. If any remain unsold, they will
be placed on my eBay store at $145-$149 + shipping to combat eBay's fees

Now $129 each
2 for $250
the 3 for $369

Paypal OK, No Extra Fee!

Email at  [url]jaycos@qualitycards.com[/url] 

McConell, Kleinow & Wilste have been SOLD!

#2 Bill Bergen - Brooklyn
#15 Kid Elberfeld - Washington
#30 George Mullin - Detroit

Thanks Erick & Steve
